title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2D.41 - Distance Signs (D2 Series)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2D.41 - Distance Signs (D2 Series)

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 03. INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 02A The distance displayed for each destination should be
the actual distance to the closest point of the destination over the route
being signed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2D.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
